name: FantasyXPERT
tag_list: productivity-tool, fantasy-football, football, aggregate, simplify, personalize, analzye, independent-research
overview:
FantasyXPERT.com is the worldâ€™s first productivity tool for fantasy football that helps people make better decisions in significantly less time.

Playing fantasy football can require an overwhelming amount of time and research. With more than 100 Web sites claiming to be “experts” and hundreds of statistics to consider, making good decisions is difficult. We feel the research process is too complicated so we set out to simplify it.

FantasyXPERT analyzes, organizes, and simplifies advice and stats from over 100 well-known and trusted websites to provide you with only the most accurate and relevant information. FantasyXPERT is not just about information, itâ€™s about radically simplifying and improving the way that you will prepare for and play the game of fantasy football.
